OCD.name: Trigonometric Operations for Wires
OCD.description: A component that applies a trigonometric function to a numeric property received in input in the component. The result will be emitted as a new property of type double.

AD.name: Operand Name
AD.description: Specifies the name of the operand property in the received envelope.

AD.name: Operator
AD.description: Specifies the trigonometric function to be executed by the component

AD.name: Result Name
AD.description: Specifies the name of the result property in emitted envelope.

AD.name: Emit Received Properties
AD.description: Specifies whether received properties should be included in the emitted envelope or not.
